Entries.Mon2: It's natural to feel discouraged.$0#$b#I just hope Leah can find herself again, she's a diamond in the rough as an artist.$0
Entries.Thu2: I should ask Leah how she's doing.$0#$b#She was having a hard time the last time I saw her.$2

Entries.Tue2: Ugh, @...$2#$b#I think I lost my watercolor box, I can't seem to find it anywhere...$2
Entries.Sat2: Take inspiration from the ocean...?$0#$b#Maybe it'll work...$0

Entries.Wed4: The best thing about living by the sea is how much inspiration I can take from it.$0#$b#I hope Leah feels the same.$0
Entries.Fri4: I actually do enjoy playing the piano.$0#$b#I think that music is on the same level of revelation as writing.$0#$e#Leah might start to feel the same way, she has been coming to my house to play the piano lately.
Entries.Sun4: Drinking good wine in good company is one of life’s most civilized pleasures.$0

Entries.Mon4: It turns out I'm not that bad at playing the piano.$1
Entries.Tue4: Elliott must be running out of wine.$0#$b#Everytime I go to his house he opens a new bottle for us to share.$0#$e#I should buy him something nice...$0
Entries.Thu4: Do you know Lang Lang, @?$0#$e#He's a really talented pianist.$0#$b#Elliott has been showing me some of his best pieces of music.$1

Entries.Mon6: Leah asked me to be her model again yesterday.$0#$b#I must admit I feel a little bit timid about it...$2
Entries.Thu6: Leah has been helping me with my latest novel.$0#$b#I'll let you know once I've finished the first chapters.$1
Entries.Sat6: Leah wants to take me foraging someday.$0#$b#Do you think we'll be able to find some fresh vegetables?$1
Entries.Sun6: I've been working on the rowboat that's been sitting by my house lately.$1

Entries.Tue6: I never thought about asking Elliott to be my model, but he's actually of great help.$1
Entries.Wed6: I bought some crab cakes from Gus earlier.$0#$b#It's a gift for Elliott, he's been so nice to me.$1
Entries.Fri6: I'm going to the saloon later, I hope Elliott goes too.$1
Entries.Sun6: I haven't had any creative blocks lately.$0#$b#Elliott always teaches me a new source of inspiration when I run out of ideas.$1

Entries.Mon8: I became independent at a young age and have lived on my own since then.$0#$b#But ever since I met Leah, I've realized how lonely I am when she isn't with me.$2
Entries.Tue8: Leah and I both moved to Pelican Town to pursue our artistic dreams.$0#$b#I'm lucky to have someone that understands me so well.$1
Entries.Wed8: Whenever I write I can't help thinking of Leah.$4#$b#I'm afraid all my characters will end up being different versions of her...$2
Entries.Thu8: When I came to Pelican Town, I was pursuing inspiration for my art.$0#$b#I'd never have guessed my muse was waiting for me here.$4
Entries.Fri8: Hello, @.$0#$e#I was working on a new poem, it's a surprise for Leah.$0#$b#Do you want to hear it?$1#$e#When I behold thy wondrous face, a precious jewel of form and grace, my heart...torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.$0#$b#Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my feelings for you.$1#$e#So, what do you think?$1
Entries.Sat8: I've started writing a journal.$0#$b#Now that I have the pleasure to make so many beautiful memories with Leah, I want to treasure all of them.$1
Entries.Sun8: I have always focused more on prose ever since I started writing.$0#$b#But now I've come to prefer poetry thanks to Leah.$1
Entries.spring_Mon8: In springtime, love is carried on the breeze.$0#$b#It reminds me of how lucky I am to have Leah in my life.$4
Entries.spring_Wed8: Spring breathes new life into the world around us.$0#$b#This morning, as I was walking by the sea with Leah, I could feel how inspiration rushed through me.$1
Entries.spring_Fri8: Leah and I went foraging yesterday.$0#$b#We were lucky and found enough vegetables to make a salad.$1
Entries.summer_Tue8: Hello, @.$0#$e#Yesterday I had a productive day, I nearly finished writing a entire chapter.$0#$b#I want to hear Leah's opinion, her suggestions always help me out.$1#$e#Have a good day.$0
Entries.summer_Sat8: Have you ever visited the tidal pools, @?$0#$e#Leah and I went there yesterday, what a wonderful view!$1
Entries.summer_Sun8: Leah and I went swimming the other day.$0#$b#I love how summer wraps its arms around her like a warm blanket.$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Oh, hello, @.$0#$e#I was reading some of Becquer's poems.$0#$b#They always remind me of Leah, let me recite one for you.$1#$e#'What's poetry?$0#$b#You ask me, as you lock your pupil into mine.$0#$b#What's poetry? You of all people ask me?$0#$b#Poetry... is Leah.$4#$e#Did you enjoy it? You may have noticed I adapted it a bit.$0#$e#Well, have a good day, @.$0
Entries.fall_Thu8: Ah... Fall has finally arrived.$0#$b#The warm sun drifts low in the sky, casting long shadows over waving fields of gold.$0#$b#It's a beautiful time of year, don't you think, @?$1#$e#You should visit the forest when you have an occasion, Leah and I like to go there for a walk in this beautiful season.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: The splendor of the fall... A verdant banquet for all the senses to enjoy...$0#$b#I must visit Leah and enjoy it together.$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: No matter what I do, I can't get my cabin to stay warm in the winter...$2#$e#Maybe I should stay at Leah's house a couple of days.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: This year has been a blessing for me.$0#$e#There is nothing better in this world than spending my time with Leah.$4#$b#I can't think of anyone with whom I'd rather share my life.$4
Entries.winter_Fri8: From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with Leah's captivating beauty.$4#$e#Oh, @! I didn't see you.$8#$b#I was daydreaming...$7
Entries.spring_23: I look forward to dancing with Leah tomorrow.$0#$b#I'm going to wear my best shirt. This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!$1
Entries.summer_10: I always say I won't forget about the Luau, but this year I'll surely remember.$0#$b#Yesterday Leah came to my house and left a note on the desk.$1#$e#Well, what will you bring for the potluck this year, @?$0
Entries.winter_23: I've made a book of poems for Leah's birthday.$4#$b#I want her to know how much I love her.$4#$e#Oh, you want to read them, @?$7#$b#I'm afraid I want to keep them between Leah and me.$0
Entries.winter_24: Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star, my favorite tradition of this town.$0#$b#I shall remember to toast to another wonderful year with Leah.$4
Entries.spring_23_2: I look forward to dancing with Leah tomorrow.$0#$b#I'm going to wear my best shirt. This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!$1
Entries.summer_10_2: I always say I won't forget about the Luau, but this year I'll surely remember.$0#$b#Yesterday Leah came to my house and left a note on the desk.$1#$e#Well, what will you bring for the potluck this year, @?$0
Entries.winter_23_2: I've made a book of poems for Leah's birthday.$4#$b#I want her to know how much I love her.$4#$e#Oh, you want to read them, @?$7#$b#I'm afraid I want to keep them between Leah and me.$0
Entries.winter_24_2: Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star, my favorite tradition of this town.$0#$b#I shall remember to toast to another wonderful year with Leah.$4

Entries.Mon8: I usually see Jas playing near my house.$0#$b#It got me thinking about if Elliott would like to have kids anytime soon...$0
Entries.Tue8: I'd love to draw a portrait of Elliott sometime.$0#$e#He'd be the most beautiful model ever.$4
Entries.Wed8: My career as an artist was not going very well when I first moved here...$2#$e#Fortunately, Elliott has always believed in me.$0#$b#He's really supportive.$1
Entries.Thu8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know, I'd never move back to the city even though it was difficult to leave everything behind.$0#$b#I love living in the valley, and I have so many plans for Elliott and me for the future.$1
Entries.Fri8: Elliott really understands me, we're both artists after all.$1
Entries.Sat8: I was afraid that I was rushing too much with Elliott...$2#$b#You know that my previous relationship ended pretty badly and I had no plans to be with anybody when I moved here.$2#$b#But then Elliott came and ruined my plans.$0#$e#But I'm glad he did, I love him so much.$4
Entries.Sun8: Elliot has been teaching me how to play the piano.$1#$b#But I don't think I'll ever reach his level.$0
Entries.spring_Mon8: I've been having a terrible artistic block...$2#$e#I should go see Elliott for some inspiration...$7
Entries.spring_Tue8: Hey, @.$1#$e#You know, it’s thanks to you and Elliott that I was able to come this far with my art.$0#$e#You should come over and have dinner with us sometime, @.$1
Entries.spring_Sun8: I've realised that when I moved here, I wasn't really trying to make new friends because I was still processing all the changes.$0#$b#But, now, I chat with everyone at the saloon, help Marnie with the animals and even have a wonderful relationship with Elliott.$1
Entries.summer_Wed8: I should take my watercolors with me the next time I go to the beach.$0#$b#I'd like to do some quick sketches of Elliott.$1
Entries.summer_Thu8: On summer days Elliott and I love to go for a swim.$1#$b#We usually go to the beach, but actually the river could also be a good option.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: I like to visit Elliott's house in the summer.$0#$b#He lives right by the sea, so it's really convenient to go for a swim.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: An old friend of mine from Zuzu City has told me that he's going to present his first art exhibition next month.$1#$b#I'm going with Elliott, maybe he could meet my parents while we're there.$1
Entries.fall_Thu8: I love walking in the forest with Elliott in the fall.$0#$b#The breeze is very pleasant.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: Fall colors are beautiful.$0#$b#Elliott says this season inspires him to write more poems than usual.$0
Entries.winter_Tue8: Have you ever heard Elliott playing the piano?$0#$b#It really inspires me.$1
Entries.winter_Wed8: Elliott asked me to teach him how to sculpt.$0#$b#It didn't go very well...$2#$b#I love him, but maybe he should stick to writing...$2
Entries.winter_Fri8: This year has been the best in my life so far.$0#$b#Seeing how my art reaches more people, being with Elliott, having a good relationship with the other townsfolk... What's not to like?$1
Entries.summer_9: Hey, @.$0#$e#I was on my way to see Elliott.$0#$b#You know, he always forgets about the Luau, so I'm going to remind him.$1
Entries.fall_5: Today is Elliott's birthday.$1#$b#We're going to have dinner together, I've prepared Tom Kha Soup.$1#$e#I also sculpted a lobster, do you think he'll like it?$0
Entries.fall_26: Seeing Vincent and Jas having fun at the Spirit's Eve yesterday made me think about having kids.$0#$e#I wonder if Elliott has thought about it too...$4
Entries.winter_8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I'm sorry, but this year I'll be cheering on Elliott on the fishing contest.$0#$b#Good luck tomorrow!$1
Entries.summer_9_2: Hey, @.$0#$e#I was on my way to see Elliott.$0#$b#You know, he always forgets about the Luau, so I'm going to remind him.$1
Entries.fall_5_2: Today is Elliott's birthday.$1#$b#We're going to have dinner together, I've prepared Tom Kha Soup.$1#$e#I also sculpted a lobster, do you think he'll like it?$0
Entries.fall_26_2: Seeing Vincent and Jas having fun at the Spirit's Eve yesterday made me think about having kids.$0#$e#I wonder if Elliott has thought about it too...$4
Entries.winter_8_2: Hey, @.$0#$e#I'm sorry, but this year I'll be cheering on Elliott on the fishing contest.$0#$b#Good luck tomorrow!$1

Entries.spring.001: Leah, may I see your drawings?$1
Entries.spring.002: Nature shows us how to love and grow alongside each other.$0
Entries.summer.001: Leah, I bought a bottle of wine yesterday.$0#$b#Would you give me the pleasure of sharing it with you?$4
Entries.summer.002: I'm glad that you showed me this place, Leah.$1
Entries.fall.002: Every leaf speaks bliss to me...$1
Entries.winter.001: Leah, do you mind if I stay here tonight?$4#$b#My house is too cold in the winter...$2
Entries.winter.002: Leah said I can't see the painting until it's finished.$0

Entries.spring.001: Elliott is writing poems and I'm drawing some quick sketches of the scenery.$1
Entries.spring.002: Elliott looks so handsome right now, should I paint him...?$4
Entries.summer.001: Elliott, can I go to your house and play the piano later?$1
Entries.summer.002: Elliott, what do you think of this coral? Isn't it too big?$2#$b#I'm going to draw it again...$2
Entries.fall.001: I love you so much, Elliott...$4
Entries.fall.002: Hey, @.$0#$b#Fall colors are more vivid in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Elliott thinks so too.$1
Entries.winter.001: Oh, @.$4#$b#Elliott and I were talking about something important, would you mind coming later?$4
Entries.winter.002: I'm painting a portrait of Elliott.$1

Entries.59020031/f Elliott 500/f Leah 500/d Mon: Saloon1/9 20/farmer 18 20 0 Willy 17 22 2 Pam 7 18 1 Clint 19 23 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Marnie 7 22 3 Emily 10 18 2 Gus 14 18 2 Elliott 4 19 2 Leah 2 20 1/skippable/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/animate Lewis false true 150 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23/pause 2800/speak Elliott "Do you want another drink, Leah?$0"/pause 900/speak Leah "That would be nice.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 1/pause 390/speak Elliott "Bartender!$0#$b#Please bring another glass of wine for the lady.$0"/pause 300/stopAnimation Gus/pause 390/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 280/speak Gus "Coming!$0"/pause 600/move Gus 0 -1 1/move Gus 3 0 0/pause 280/playSound Milking/pause 1200/move Gus -11 0 2/move Gus 0 3 3/move Gus -1 0 3/pause 350/speak Gus "Here you go.$0"/pause 80/playSound dwoop/pause 500/speak Leah "Thank you, Gus.$0"/pause 650/move Gus 1 0 0/move Gus 0 -3 1/move Gus 8 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/pause 100/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 1000/speak Elliott "Well, how are you doing these days?$0#$b#Is your art going well?$0"/pause 780/speak Leah "...$2#$b#*sigh* Not really...$2"/pause 800/speak Elliott "Oh... How so?$2"/pause 850/speak Leah "Well...$2#$b#When I moved here, I thought the rural life would keep me inspired all the time, but it turns out that isn't the case...$2"/pause 680/speak Leah "Also, I've having a hard time focusing lately...$2"/pause 1200/speak Leah "Am I even a real artist...?$2"/pause 380/emote Leah 28/pause 680/speak Leah "Elliott, you understand what I'm saying, right?$3"/pause 850/speak Elliott "Leah, don't even think about doubting your talent as an artist.$7"/pause 720/speak Elliott "I remember the day you first showed me a painting of yours.$0"/pause 720/speak Elliott "I could see the passion in your eyes.$0#$b#You are and will always be an artist, Leah.$0"/pause 390/emote Leah 60/pause 850/speak Elliott "You just need some time to clear your mind.$0#$b#I also feel uninspired some days, it's natural.$0"/pause 800/speak Elliott "But I am fortunate to live next to the sea.$0#$b#The ocean stirs the heart and inspires the imagination.$1"/pause 950/speak Elliott "Perhaps you should come by the beach sometime.$0#$b#Don't you have a watercolor box? You could bring it with you and try to reflect the beauty of the ocean.$0"/pause 950/speak Elliott "Oh, and it'll be my pleasure to invite you to my house afterwards and have a glass of wine together.$1"/pause 800/speak Leah "That sounds great.$1"/pause 750/speak Leah "I'll make sure to bring a salad made of fresh vegetables.$0#$b#You know, I'm pretty good at foraging.$1"/pause 390/emote Elliott 32/pause 2100/end dialogue Leah "Elliott really understands the struggles of being an artist.$0"

Entries.59020032/e 59020031/f Elliott 1000/f Lea: breezy/42 23/farmer 1000 1000 2 Elliott -1000 1000 0 Leah 39 23 2/skippable/animate Leah false true 180 35 35 35 35 35 35 32 32 33 33 33 34 34/pause 5800/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 35/pause 280/emote Leah 40/pause 700/speak Leah "This looks good.$1"/pause 580/speak Leah "Oh, look at the time.$0#$b#I should thank Elliott before returning home.$0"/pause 800/showFrame Leah 0/pause 500/viewport move 0 -1 1800/move Leah 0 -9 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation ElliottHouse/warp Elliott 8 4/positionOffset Elliott 32 16/animate Elliott false true 400 25 26 26 27 27 26 26 25 26 27 27 26 26 25/playMusic elliottPiano/viewport 8 5 true/pause 24000/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 24/playMusic communityCenter/pause 700/playSound doorOpen/warp Leah 3 9/pause 320/move Leah 0 -3 0/move Leah 4 0 0/pause 500/showFrame Elliott 28/pause 650/speak Elliott "Hello, Leah.$0#$b#I wasn't expecting your visit, but it's a pleasure to see you.$1"/pause 380/showFrame Elliott 29/pause 50/positionOffset Elliott 32 16/showFrame Elliott 30/pause 80/playSound woodyStep/pause 50/move Elliott 0 1 3/pause 600/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 800/speak Leah "Were you playing the piano, Elliott?$0#$b#That was incredible!$1#$b#You're like a renaissance man.$1"/pause 800/speak Elliott "Oh, you flatter me.$0"/pause 600/speak Elliott "I often play in search of inspiration.$0#$b#Sometimes I can express myself better on the piano than with writing.$0"/pause 720/speak Leah "I wish I could play too, but I've never been gifted in music.$0"/pause 750/speak Elliott "Have you ever tried? You never know what will happen.$0"/pause 680/speak Leah "Well, I have never played the piano before, but I know for sure playing the guitar isn't my thing.$1"/pause 780/speak Elliott "Well, why don't we share a bottle of wine while I explain to you some basics about the piano?$0"/pause 750/speak Leah "That sounds good.$1"/pause 600/speak Leah "Actually, I came because I wanted to show you some sketches I made earlier.$0#$b#I followed your advice and it really helped.$1"/pause 800/speak Elliott "I'm glad it did.$1"/pause 500/speak Elliott "Now, shall we?$0"/pause 390/emote Leah 32/pause 1800/end dialogue Leah "Maybe I'll become the next Beethoven thanks to Elliott's piano classes.$0#$e#Just joking.$1"

780/speak Elliott "Would you do me the honor of joining me for her maiden voyage?$4"/pause 620/speak Leah "I'd love to...$4"/pause 950/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ElliottSea/warp Leah 26 20/warp Elliott 26 20/showFrame Elliott 25/positionOffset Elliott 0 60/positionOffset Leah 0 -25/viewport 25 20 true/pause 3800/speak Elliott "Navigating the ocean so late at night might be overwhelming at first, but I'm sure you will learn to love it in no time.$0"/pause 1200/speak Leah "Every year, when the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies comes, I dream of swimming with them in the vast ocean.$0"/pause 520/speak Leah "Do you think we could ride the boat at the festival next year?$1"/pause 680/speak Elliott "Of course we can.$1"/pause 1250/speak Elliott "Leah...$0#$b#I invited you here because I have something important to say to you.$4"/pause 820/speak Elliott "Well, we've been friends for a long time now.$0#$b#And I knew there was something special in you when I met you.$1"/pause 780/speak Elliott "We share passions, dreams, hopes.$0#$b#And...$0"/pause 1000/emote Elliott 40/pause 850/speak Elliott "For once, I'm at a loss for words...$4"/pause 850/speak Elliott "I knew this could happen, hence I wrote a poem for you.$4#$b#Let me recite it.$4"/pause 1200/speak Elliott "I know no freedom but the freedom of being imprisoned in you.$4#$b#You, that someone for whom I forget this cruel existence,$4#$b#that someone who brings me the freedom of love,$4#$b#the only freedom that brings me joy, the only freedom I would die for.$4"/pause 950/speak Elliott "Leah, you justify my existence:$4#$b#if I have not met you, I have not lived;$4#$b#if I die without having met you, I die not, because I have not lived.$4"/pause 800/speak Leah "Oh, Elliott...$4"/pause 1000/showFrame Elliott 35/screenFlash 1/warp Elliott 26 20/positionOffset Elliott 24 8/positionOffset Leah -20 16/faceDirection Leah 1 true/showFrame Leah 25/specificTemporarySprite heart 26 20/playSound dwop/pause 2800/end dialogue Elliott "Love allows us to walk in the sweet music of our particular heart.$4"
